name: @peakhealth/ui
description: Peak Health Design System - A comprehensive UI component library

scripts.build: tsc && npm run copy-css-files && npm run create-index-css
scripts.copy-css-files: find src/components -name '*.css' -exec sh -c 'mkdir -p dist/$(dirname "$1" | sed "s|^src/||") && cp "$1" "dist/$(echo "$1" | sed "s|^src/||")"' _ {} \;

author: Peak Health Team
